en_US: Does not use water for production anymore, but takes longer.
Increase the fruits speed boost, letting you move even faster.
Adds a machine under the dome that slowly produces water through condensation.
Use the Teleporter Station to teleport to the Portal, and vice versa.
Send resources offworld to gain prestige among the keepers.
Reflected spheres will deal much more damage to the rock they hit next.
Reduces the time needed to condense one water.
Trigger an active combat ability that makes your dome invulnerable for a short time.
Displays the time until the next wave of hostile lifeforms attack.
Improve your gravity generator to move faster.
After overcharging, the battle ability will last longer in the next wave.
Hitting energy projectiles with the laser immediately dissolves them.
Improve the damage the kinetic sphere deals to rocks upon impact. Also improves rotational mining damage.
This world has a lot of iron.
Enable the need to refuel your keepers movement aggregate with water.
Improve the damage the kinetic sphere deals to rocks upon impact. Also improves rotational mining damage.
Permanently increase the structural health of your dome.
Increase Repellent production speed for {} cycles
The monsters are more feeble, dealing less damage
Install a shield that will absorb some damage. Recharges automatically.

Renders the game in the native screen or windowed resolution.
Will look sharp, but visual errors in the form of 1 pixel wide lines may appear.
Trigger again to cause all trapped monsters to explode, dealing damage around them.
Adds a probe to your suit which when triggered sends out a pulse that reveals nearby resources. Must be recharged at the station under the dome.
Install a longer and more nimble blade.
Increases how much damage the dome shield can absorb.
The portal can teleport resources more often.

Set the value so that the bar does not flicker if you only touch thumbsticks, without pushing them.
If you push the thumbstick, the bar should flicker when moving the stick.
Render a bright outline around monsters, for better visibility.
Can convert resources, helping you balance your resource inventory.
Spray a numbing mist during battle that slows all monsters down.
An average sized map for a proper mining session.
{} cycles additional buff duration after overcharge
There are much more extremely hard and soft rocks.
Send iron offworld to increase your prestige.

Gain a long period of invulnerability when your dome is about to be destroyed.
After that, your shield does not charge for the next battle. Last stand can only be triggered again after 2 completed waves.
Strengthen the drill to dig faster.
Fruit growth speed doubles for {} cycles
Then hit | to enter battle mode and defend.
The mist slows monsters even more and lasts for longer.
Move to the station and hit | to enter it.
Harden the dome surface to take less damage from monsters melee hits. Projectile damage is unaffected.
Improve the jetpack to move faster.
The faster the sword swings, the higher the slice damage.
The probe will slowly recharges on its own over time.
The orbs can carry more resources.
The stun laser cools down faster and fires for longer.
Increases damage done by the stun laser.
Add targeting sights to the laser, showing where it is aiming.
The condenser will produce and store two water, before it stops working.
Strengthen the drill to dig faster.
Further increases the delay of the next wave of monsters.
Plant a tree in the dome that grows fruits to buff your movement and mining power.
Trigger an active combat ability that creates a deadly field effect around your dome for a short time.
Shred the gadget and gain {amount} cobalt.
Install a massive blade. It's slower, but deals heavy damage.
Produces 3 small charges instead of a large one.
Strengthen the drill to dig faster.
Split incoming spheres into two, launching them perpendicular to the original.
Install a counter that shows how many waves you've survived.
Increases the detection range of the prospection meter.
Your dome automatically repairs, if it takes a lot of damage during a battle.
Send back Cobalt, increases the prestige point multiplier you get each wave.
Repair damage to your dome with cobalt.
Still not easy, but more relaxed than the other difficulties.
Grow more roots that last longer.
Increase the fruits speed boost, letting you move extremely fast.
Find the relic buried deep and bring it back to your dome.
Win a run with the previous map size, to unlock this map size.
The biomes borders are very irregular.
Hit|to reflect incoming kinetic spheres for a very short time.
Improve the jetpack to carry more resources.
Install a laser that auto targets and stuns monsters.
The projectile shields are stronger. Also gain an additional ability use after using overcharge.
Increase the fruits speed boost, letting you move faster.
A precision laser that moves along your dome. Originally made to mine asteroids.
Cobalt is more scattered and harder to predict.
Cannot set this as a gamepad input
Use volatile spores in the mist to stun monsters, stopping them in their tracks for a short time.
There are more iron clusters around, but they are smaller.
There are more harder rocks in the mine.
Use the spores more often and stun the monsters for longer.
Your shield battle ability will be active even longer in the next wave after overcharging.
It recharges its power with each bounce.
You have twice as much time between waves, but the waves will be stronger.
Choose a direction and release to shoot the sphere.
Improves the power of your laser, but it will move slower while firing.
Migrate from world to world, stripping each of resources and relics before you get overrun.
Increase the fruits mining boost, letting you mine faster.
Improve the damage the kinetic sphere deals to rocks upon impact. Also improves rotational mining damage.
Increase the fruits mining boost, letting you mine extremely fast.
You can use your cobalt to repair your dome. It's an upgrade in the dome tech tree.

Renders the game in a fixed resolution and scales it to your resolution.
Can be pixelated, especially in fonts, but there are no visual line errors.
Hold|to pull in resources, until they are locked onto you.
Drillbert goes to sleep after a while, or when it meets a wall it can't dig.
If you aim into a direction while dropping a resource, it will be accelerated heavily.
When close to it, hit | to wake it.
You can make it turn around by hitting | when it's awake.
Displays the current amount of stored resources.
Improved stab strength and ability to guide in flight.
This world has a lot of water.
Increases the dig strength of Drillbert.
A simple AI will control the stun laser even when you are not inside the control station.
Greatly improves the power of your laser, but it will move even slower while firing.
Further reduces the time needed to condense one water.
Improve your gravity generator to move faster.
The blast will last longer if triggered after your shield runs out.
Overcharging your tank will also prolong any repellent battle ability you use in the next wave.
Water is more scattered and harder to predict.
Take the Blast Charge and drop it where you want to clear rocks.
Cannot set this as a keyboard input
The kinetic sphere transcends rock hardness and damages the rock by a fixed fraction of its health.
Shred the gadget and gain {amount} iron.
Adopt a loveable creature that loves to dig. Carry it into the mine and drop off where you want it to work. Check back to wake it up when it goes to sleep on the job.
Activate on getting more damage than {} hp
Add a laser sight for aiming the sword stab.
Pick a resource conversion to start!
Improve your gravity generator to move faster.
The prestige multiplier starts high and decreases each cycle.
A huge map for the longest runs.
Your teleporter has a station and a portal. You can teleport between them.
Grab the Portal and place it where you like.
Install a swivel head into the laser that automatically corrects your aim if it comes close.

You just found a mineral tree seed. It can grow into a tree which roots into tiles. It will grow resources depending on the resources of the rooted tiles.
Drop it on a tile to plant the seed.
Adds a machine under the dome that produces blast charges. Carry them into the mines and release to detonate.
Further increase the delay until the next wave after overcharging.
Switch to a fast, short range probe with many charges.
Invulnerability automatically activates an additional time when the shield runs out.
Displays the direction to the nearest iron deposits.
Score points by sending home as many resources as possible before your dome falls or you safely leave the planet.
The mine is thin at first, and gets very wide in the depths.
Permanently increase the structural health of your dome and repair it.
An unconventional miner who employs experimental gravity technology.
Use the sword's shield pad to stop projectiles, or even reflect them.
Hold|while carrying resources, to charge a bundle.
Aim and release to shoot it, the same way you fire a kinetic sphere.
The mine is deeper and less wide.
Send back Water, adds 1 to the prestige you get each wave.
The blast charge will explode on impact with a surface.
To remove a single rock, you can move the rotating kinetic sphere into it.
In worlds without monsters, you can concentrate on mining as many resources as you want without distraction.
The mist slows monsters more and lasts longer.
The portal will teleport resources from a larger area than before.
Instead of retracting with a cable, the sword charges and is shot from the dome like a javelin.
All monsters take a little damage for each second the toxic fumes persist.
The monsters are more lethal, dealing more damage.
Your dome automatically repairs more, if it takes a lot of damage during a battle.
Send back Cobalt, increases the prestige point multiplier you get each wave.
Teleporting yourself will take less time.
Grow a shield that protects the dome from projectiles.
Going back to the main menu in ...
You can stop mining without shooting a sphere, by first releasing the directional keys.
Increase the fruits mining boost, letting you mine even faster.
A bit more forgiving in many aspects.
After getting a treat, Drillbert will work far longer before getting sleepy.
Massively improves the power of your laser, but it barely moves while firing.
Extend the sword and stab distant enemies.

Edit the control mapping to your liking.
Keys from different sections can generally overlap without issue (like using the same keys to move your keeper and the dome weapon).
A large map for sessions lasting more than an hour.
Strengthen the drill to dig faster.
Drillbert will work for much longer before getting sleepy.
Further increase blade speed, making it bounce when hitting the edge.
There are very few extremely hard and soft rocks.
Leave this planet and go back home.
Permanently increase the structural health of your dome and repair it.
The lift boosts your speed when moving upwards inside it.
Weakens all present monsters, immediately lowering their remaining health.
Automates water collection, removing the need for you to pick it up manually.
A meter showing the distance to the nearest resources. Can be upgraded to also show direction.
An electric current runs through the blade, dealing damage on touch.
Send water offworld to increase your prestige.
Reflected projectiles fly back at a higher speed, increasing their chances of hitting the attacker.
Monsters move much faster, but have less health.
The sword delivers a bomb, exploding on the first enemy the sword stabs.
Water conversion becomes more efficient, but takes a bit longer.
Effects of the fruit last longer.
Concentrate on the most efficient mining in a world without monsters. Lasts 20 cycles.
Send resources off planet with a rocket, to reach a high score after 20 cycles. Same as prestige mode, but without monsters.
Use water to overcharge your tank to produce the next load of repellent faster.
Further increases the detection range of the prospection meter.
Spheres are powered when reflected, which will accelerate them and let them float for longer upon reflection.
Increases how much damage the overcharged shield absorbs.
Increases the delay of the next wave of monsters.
When stabbed, the sword automatically locks on to the first monster it targets.
Use water to overcharge your orchard, making it faster to produce a fruit.
Further improved stab strength and more precise control in flight.
Increases the range of the probe ping, but lose a charge slot.
The monster waves are farther apart.
We hope you had a good time! We always appreciate your feedback, let us know what you think on Discord or the Steam Forums :)
Harden the dome surface more to take less damage from monsters melee hits. Projectile damage is unaffected.
Improve the jetpack to move faster.
Improve the jetpack to move faster.
Disable worm, bug or spider like critters that spawn in the mine as visual effects.
Overcharging also increases the delay time until the next wave.
Reduces the time needed to create a blast charge.
Hold | to pick up Drillbert again.
Improves the probe, making it generally better.
Hit | to make it change direction, if on ground.
Improve the jetpack to move faster.
Not yet available, but coming soon.
Installs a second laser turret, but splits your firepower between both them.
Cobalt conversion becomes very efficient, but takes a long time.
Select a Gadget To Keep For Your Next Run
Powerful dome with a dynamic sword that keepers can master to dominate attackers.
Spheres are intensely powered up when reflected.
Reflect more often for a shorter amount of time.
Install a tank that produces a monster repelling liquid. Activate to spray it outside the dome, delaying the next wave of attackers.
Improve the jetpack to carry more resources.
Activate in battle to grow roots outside the dome that will trap any medium sized monster stepping on them.
Reflect spheres with a high powered, small gravity field around yourself.
The iron clusters are more scattered and harder to predict.
Further increases how much damage the shield can absorb.
Reflected spheres will deal much more damage to the rock they hit next.
Widen and lengthen the blade, dealing more damage.
Increases the dig strength of Drillbert.
Hit | to drop one. Hold to drop many.
The mine is rough and irregular.
You just found a one way teleporter!
Attached minerals can be shot as a bundle, in the same way you shoot kinetic spheres.
Press again to teleport back to it.
Hold | to pick up the portal again, when close to it.
If you hit |, you will teleport back.
Transform water into fuel, filling up your domes fuel storage so you can refuel your keeper.
You can move the portal anywhere you want.
Hit | to emit a probe impulse.
The lift will speed you up even more.

It reveals some of the nearby resources.
Recharge back at the station.
This world has a lot of cobalt.
Improve the damage the kinetic sphere deals to rocks upon impact. Also improves rotational mining damage.
Turn around when hitting a hard wall
Standard mining dome equipped with a precision laser.
Take Drillbert from its tank, and place it in the mine, where it should dig.
Install an automated lift that brings mined resources up for processing in the dome.
Permanently increase the structural health of your dome.
Well, it's your Dome to lose.
Increases the dig strength of Drillbert.
When close to the portal, hit | to teleport back.
You can also teleport in the other direction.
When meeting an indestructible wall, Drillbert will turn around instead of taking a nap.
Keeps your primary gadget permanently overcharged, without using up water. Condenser water production will be delayed after overcharging.
The portal now teleports resources, but can't teleport you back anymore. You can still teleport from the dome to the portal.
Drillbert gets an identical twin, Drilliam.
Reflected projectiles explode when they hit something.
A skilled, efficient professional with excellent mining skills.
The fruit effects will last for longer after overcharging the orchard.
The map is maze-like, with many arms, dead ends and twists.
Improve the jetpack to carry more resources.
Displays the distance to the nearest water deposits.
Charges stick to the first wall they touch, and blast a tunnel into it instead of a circular explosion.
Allows converting cobalt to iron and vice versa.
Increases the damage rotational mining does, transcending rock hardness.
Effects of the fruit last even longer.
Repair damage to your dome with cobalt.
A monstrous blade. Very powerful but slow moving.
Overcharging your shield will also prolong any shield battle ability you use in the next wave.
Press a new key for this action …

Are you sure you want to quit?
Press again to do so.
(your progress is saved)
Displays the direction to the nearest cobalt deposits.
Add a memory module to the probe, marking the location of resources for longer.
Prolongs and strengthens the withering of all present monsters.
Additional Sphere Damage on Reflection for Next Bounce {.percent}
Stabilize the kinetic sphere, so it will float for longer.
Iron desposits are twice as rich, but upgrades cost twice the iron too.

Try to find some cobalt. You can repair your dome with it.
It is rare and finite.
Add an additional module to your gravity generator, so it can corral more kinetic spheres.
Improve the jetpack to carry more resources.
Grow another layer of projectile shields.
Further increases how much damage the shield can absorb.
There are more softer rocks in the mine.
Hit | to pick up a resource.
Your orchard just grew its first fruit.
When next to it, hit | to consume it.
The mine is wider and less deep.
Leave this planet and go back home.
The portal gains back the ability to teleport you.
Adds a small amount of damage to the stun laser.
Send back Iron, adds 1 to the prestige you get each wave.
Small tease of what's to come:
A small map for shorter sessions.
Increases the damage and stun effect of the electro blast.
These languages are translated by our lovely community. Join them if you like!
Displays the direction to the nearest water deposits.
Improve the slicing strength and speed of your sword.
Shot bundles will stay right under the dome, instead of flying past the central axis.
Further increases how much damage the overcharged shield absorbs.
Further increases the delay of the next wave of monsters.
A two-way teleporter with a station under the dome and portal that can be placed and moved around the mines.
When close to it, hit | to activate it.
Your repellent is ready to delay the next wave.
Stab even faster and more often.
A durable sword that does more damage the further it swings across the dome when slicing. It can be fired to stab monsters and has a shield pad base that blocks projectiles.
Shows the expected trajectory of a launched grenade.
Trigger an active combat ability that reflects incoming projectiles for a short time.
Bundles will stay stable for a very long time.
There are only few iron clusters around, but they are very large.
Increases the dig strength of Drillbert.
Permanently increase the structural health of your dome.
Use water to manually overcharge your shield so it absorbs more damage in the next wave.
Treats grow at the nest under the dome. Take them to Drillbert who will happily gobble them up to get energized.
Increase the shield pad size and make it reflect energy projectiles.
Stabilize the kinetic sphere, so it will float for longer.
Permanently increase the structural health of your dome.
Once locked onto you, they will follow you even if you release the collection key.
The stun laser moves even faster and keeps tracking monsters when cooling down.
Add an additional module to your gravity generator, so it can corral more kinetic spheres.
The stun laser cools down faster and shoots for longer.
Displays the distance to the nearest cobalt deposits.
The map has no cobalt and you can't generate it, but you start with plenty of it.
